title: Fun for all
brief_description: Car Crazy: On an airstrip at Abbotsford, near Vancouver, young hot-rodders indulge their speed craze with the approval of policemen. Trappers at Play: The Pas, in northern Manitoba, stages the annual Trappers’ Festival. Lumberjack’s Picnic: Vancouver Island forestry champions compete and compare know-how.
